official-title.#text: To require that, if the President’s fiscal year 2014 budget does not achieve balance in a fiscal year covered by such budget, the President shall submit a supplemental unified budget by April 1, 2013, which identifies a fiscal year in which balance is achieved, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives February 6, 2013.

short-title.#text: Require Presidential Leadership and No Deficit Act
